entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
